title: Elise game play bug
body: The issue is elise's stun when used at her human form q range  or even point blank range doesn't allow her to get her full combo off which is qwq against champions with any movement enhancer (blink, increase speed, gap closer) I think this is really detrimental to the champ and makes her fell awfully clumsy as her qw and change into spider form animation takes longer than a second. Fishing for a riot post to see if this can get fix by simply increasing animation speed.

replies.body: Your not looking at this logically. Each to there own
So "logically" a bug is any problem you have whether it's intended to be that way or not?

I think its just a difference of opinion of what a bug is. This reminds me a lot of the quinn vault e where you could vault out of range and not auto attack. I think thats a bug because its not how the champion was design to play thus it got changed similar to what is happening to Elise imo.

It's pretty clear that what you're talking about with Elise wasn't a bug, it was **intended** to be a 1 second stun at rank 1. That's what it says in the description, that's the way it's coded. The difference between Elise's Cocoon and Quinn's Vault is that Quinn's Vault wasn't intended to act that way.

Awesome i knew it was an issue that needed to be fixed. Secondly to heartvine  I dont think that how she is suppose to work thats why it is getting changed and because it feels awfully clunky and stupid when you point blank stun someone and you cant even q them in spider form

> I dont think that how she is suppose to work

It's how she was designed. If something isn't designed the way it's supposed to work, then what's the point? The buffs currently on PBE are just changing the way she works.

Elise
Cocoon (Human E)* stun duration increased to 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds from 1.5 at all ranks
[Note: Live values for stun are currently 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.]
Cocoon (Human E) cooldown reverted to 14/13/12/11/10 sec from 14/12.5/11/9.5/8 sec
[Note: Reverted back to live values.]
Spider Form (R)*: 
Spiderlings now deal magic damage instead of physical damage
Spiderlings damage AP ratio increased to 15% AP from 10% AP.
Theres the buffs on the pbe so far
Firstly, that's not a bug, it's how Elise works. Secondly, there's a buff on the PBE.
